content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction area
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)
- Beltgroup (position x3) that connects the burner mining drill to the furnace at position (x1)

### Iron gear wheel crafting area
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x4) that requires iron-plate and iron-gear-wheel

### Iron plate production area
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x5) that produces iron plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors with crafting machines
- Verify that you have the necessary crafting machines set up to produce the items you need. For instance, crafting iron gear wheels requires a machine that can smelt or craft the required ingredients.
